chapter.title: Invoicing Sheets
chapter.para: A key feature of the Full version of the CORE Time & Expense is Invoicing. The time and expense lines that are entered can be invoiced a number of different ways. In this chapter we will review the various methods of invoicing from Time and Expense. The following topics will be covered:

listitem.para: Approving Sheets
Invoicing Specific Sheets
Consolidated Invoices

section.title: Approving Sheets
section.para: Approving Sheets is performed in the Open Sheets screen. For this scenario, we'll need to select a single sheet to begin. To select a Sheet, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Follow this path: Sales > Time and Expense > Open Sheets...
The following screen will appear:

note.para: The buttons that are disabled are controlled by privileges. Privileges are discussed in Chapter 1 - System Administration.

section.para: Let's approve the Sheet, 1011. To get started, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Select the 1011 Sheet
Select the Approve button. The Sheet is now Approved and ready for Invoicing and Vouchering.

section.title: Invoicing Specific Sheets
section.para: The invoicing of specific Sheets is performed in the Open Sheets screen. For this scenario, we'll need to select a single sheet to begin. To select a Sheet, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Follow this path: Sales > Time and Expense > Open Sheets...
The following screen will appear:

note.para: The buttons that are disabled are controlled by privileges. Privileges are discussed in Chapter 1 - System Administration.

listitem.para: Select a Sheet that has been Approved
Click the Invoice button to generate an Invoice.

note.para: The Invoice Status changes to 'C' for Completed.

listitem.para: Review the unposted invoice
Follow this path: Accounting > Accounts Receivable > Invoice > List Unposted...
The following screen will appear:

Edit the Invoice in order to review the details. The Notes from the Time entry are passed thru to the Invoice Item. These Notes will print on the Invoice and provide greater detail for the billing line.

section.title: Consolidated Invoicing
section.para: The generation of Consolidated Invoices is performed in the Open Sheets screen. For this scenario, we'll select multiple Sheets to begin. To select multiple Sheets, follow these steps:

note.para: Consolidation will happen by Sheet Date, Customer, PO and Project.

listitem.para: Select multiple Sheets that have been Approved
Click the Cons Invoice to generate the Consolidated Invoice.

note.para: The Invoice Status changes to 'C' for Completed.

listitem.para: Review the unposted invoice
Follow this path: Accounting > Accounts Receivable > Invoice > List Unposted...
The following screen will appear:
Edit the Invoice in order to review the details.
